survey.title: Issuance and Economic Control Survey
survey.description: Please provide your input on the issuance and economic control of FREEOS tokens.

questions.title: Issuance
questions.question: What percentage of the issuance should be minted this week?
questions.description: Issuance is the amount of Points issued weekly. Minimising the issuance reduces the supply of FREEOS tokens that can be minted. Restricting supply can increase the price when there is suitable demand.

questions.title: Burning
questions.question: What percentage of the FREEOS tokens should be burned this week?
questions.description: Burning removes FREEOS tokens from circulation, which can affect the supply-demand balance and influence the token's price.

questions.title: Staking Rewards
questions.question: What percentage of rewards should be issued for staking this week?
questions.description: Staking rewards incentivize participants to lock their FREEOS tokens, reducing the circulating supply and potentially increasing the price.

questions.title: Locking Threshold
questions.question: What percentage of the Locking Threshold should be adjusted this week?
questions.description: Locking thresholds determine how much FREEOS needs to be staked for voting and other network activities.

questions.title: Supply Control
questions.question: What percentage of the total supply should be adjusted this week?
questions.description: Supply control adjusts the total issuance and burning combined, aiming to maintain a balance between inflation and deflation of FREEOS tokens.
